text.div:
BulkDataAccessIG

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.uv.bulkdata

FHIR based approach for exporting large data sets from a FHIR server to a client application

name: BulkDataAccessIG
title: Bulk Data Access IG
publisher: HL7 International - FHIR Infrastructure Work Group
description: FHIR based approach for exporting large data sets from a FHIR server to a client application

resource.name: FHIR Bulk Data Access Implementation Guide
resource.description: The expected capabilities of a FHIR Resource Server actor (e.g., EHR systems, data warehouses, and other clinical and administrative systems that aim to interoperate by sharing large FHIR datasets) which is responsible for providing responses to the queries submitted by a FHIR Bulk Data Client actor. Systems implementing this capability statement should meet the requirements set by the Bulk Data Access Implementation Guide. A FHIR Bulk Data Client has the option of choosing from this list to access necessary data based on use cases and other contextual requirements.

resource.name: FHIR Bulk Data System Level Export
resource.description: Export data from a FHIR server whether or not it is associated with a patient. This supports use cases like backing up a server or exporting terminology data by restricting the resources returned using the _type parameter. The FHIR server SHALL support invocation of this operation using the [FHIR Asynchronous Request Pattern](http://hl7.org/fhir/async.html)

resource.name: FHIR Bulk Data Group Level Export
resource.description: FHIR Operation to obtain a detailed set of FHIR resources of diverse resource types pertaining to all patients in specified [Group](https://www.hl7.org/fhir/group.html). The FHIR server SHALL support invocation of this operation using the [FHIR Asynchronous Request Pattern](http://hl7.org/fhir/async.html)

resource.name: FHIR Bulk Data Patient Level Export
resource.description: FHIR Operation to obtain a detailed set of FHIR resources of diverse resource types pertaining to all patients. The FHIR server SHALL support invocation of this operation using the [FHIR Asynchronous Request Pattern](http://hl7.org/fhir/async.html)

resource.name: IncludeAssociatedData
resource.description: Metadata include options for Bulk Data Access Export Operation includeAssociatedData parameter

resource.name: IncludeAssociatedData
resource.description: Metadata include options for Bulk Data Access Export Operation includeAssociatedData parameter
